TopicTitle: Cannot change max physics delta setting; when I try, it reverts back

Articles.Content:
I hope I'm not breaking any forum rules but I'm afraid this specific issue might have gotten buried in the other thread.

Basically my max physics delta is at 0.02 (minimum) at all times. When I try changing it under settings, I feel absolutely no difference in-game, and every time I'm back at the settings menu it's again at 0.02. It doesn't matter which value I set it to.

I've also tried manually changing it on settings.cfg. Same behaviour.

Many thanks for any insights.
